credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Fallen Angels
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
description: The face of a man holding a cigarette, at left; face of woman upper right. Small-sized text in lower right, in Chinese, running vertically. At right, the text "fallen angels" In English, followed by vertical text in Chinese, followed by English text along right edge: " a film by Wong Kar-Wai." Color scheme: black, orange, blue, green.
name: Poster
